sentences.en: Anshan is a steel metropolis in our country.
He was dazzled by the gaiety and splendour of the metropolis.
sentences.cn: 大都市的花花世界使他感到眼花缭乱.

sentences.en: Highly developed modern service industries are the symbol ofthe modernized metropolis.
sentences.cn: 高度发达的现代服务业是现代化国际大都市的重要标志.

sentences.en: It was delightful to see the green landscape before us and the immense metropolis behind.
sentences.cn: 展望前边青翠的景色,回顾后面雄伟的京城,真使人心旷神怡.

sentences.en: New York is the metropolis of North America.
Shanghai is an international metropolis full of vigor and variety.
sentences.cn: 上海是一座朝气蓬勃、满活力、姿多彩的国际化大都市.

sentences.en: She was rehearsing at the Metropolis Theatre.
sentences.cn: 她正在都市剧院排演节目.

sentences.en: Tessenow decried the metropolis and extolled the peasant virtues.
sentences.cn: 特森诺夫痛诋大都市,颂扬农民的美德.

sentences.en: The bustling and hustling of metropolis dazed and dazzled him.
sentences.cn: 大都市车如流水马如龙的繁华景象,看得他头晕目眩眼花缭乱.

sentences.en: The city has become a huge, bustling metropolis.
sentences.cn: 这座城市已变成繁忙的大都市。

sentences.en: The hard - working Milanese run their busy metropolis with efficiency and aplomb.
sentences.cn: 勤劳的米兰人平静、高效地奔走在繁忙的都市.

sentences.en: The journey from our town to the metropolis was a journey of about five hours.
sentences.cn: 从我们镇上到京城,大概是五小时旅程.

sentences.en: The metropolis is a confusion of old and new.
sentences.cn: 大都市是新与旧的大杂烩.

sentences.en: The quaint Persian city has been engulfed by a roaring metropolis.
sentences.cn: 那富有奇趣的波斯城市已经被一座喧嚣的大都会所吞没.

sentences.en: This sales department of a dress company is an authentic - fashion metropolis.
sentences.cn: 服装公司门市部,真正的时装之都.

sentences.en: This was a great , pleasing metropolis after all.
sentences.cn: 这毕竟是个令人振奋的大都市.

words.tran_cn: 主要都市,大城市,中心城市

trans.tran_cn: 大都市，大都会，首府，首都，大主教区，大城市
trans.tran_en: a very large city that is the most important city in a country or area
